channel.title: Good forum software other than vB?
channel.description:
Hey guys... I was just wondering if there was any good forum software other than like vB?
I've tried myBB, it was supposed to be good, but mine turned out horrible, its easy to use, looks like vB, but it doesnt save the cookies, so you cant log in. [size=7pt][if you could help me with that it would be great][/size]
I also tried phBB, that really sucked bad. I've tried loads of other ones, but they were all horrible,
Well thanks anyways.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 02, 2008, 09:01:15 am[/size][hr]Btw, if this isnt aloud I will remove it as soon as possible, I could only see one rule for this forum, and that was no advertising.

item.title: Good forum software other than vB?
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

if would rather myBB fix the cookies cant be that hard, find the login script and post it here im sure someone can see if its not correct…

Read full topic
